nl.group11.planplan

Class ImageCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.group11.planplan.ImageCache

  • public abstract class ImageCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by s132054 on 15-3-2016. Singleton Cache for images; makes displaying images that come from the internet more efficient

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.graphics.Bitmap getImageFromURL(java.lang.String url, nl.group11.planplan.APIHandler.Callback<android.graphics.Bitmap> callback)
      returns an image, given an image url.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getImageFromURL

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getImageFromURL(java.lang.String url,
                                      nl.group11.planplan.APIHandler.Callback<android.graphics.Bitmap> callback)
        returns an image, given an image url. Images are cached, so that future requests do not generate more internet requests
        Parameters:
        url - the url of the image to be fetched
        callback - callback that can be used to notify the image requestor that their image is ready
        Returns:
        the image belonging to url when it is in cache, otherwise fallback
